name: Imperial Guard Jumpsuit
description: A light jumpsuit with camouflage dye and a label reading 'Imperial Guard'.  Very easy to move in while providing some small protection.

name: Comisar's hat
description: A black, wide, flat-top hat, in the style of an admerals hat but with a golden two-headded eagle on the front. On the inside brim is scratched 'hat-chan'.

name: Comisars cloak
description: A thick cloak with some pockets on the inside. Made of a very sturdy, thick woven fabric. Several pins decorate the folded coller with a styalised 'IG' on the left brest and on the right, the words 'ad imperatorem'
